thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Breaking: North Korea Says It Is Open to U.S. Talks on Denuclearization
North Korea said it is willing to hold talks with the U.S. to give up its nuclear weapons and normalize relations, according to South Korean officials. After meetings between envoys from the South and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, Pyongyang signaled a “clear intent to pursue denuclearization,” according to Chung Eui-yong, South Korea’s national security adviser. North Korea said that it wouldn’t conduct nuclear or missile testing during... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
